data.persona: I'm a nasty horsefly. Bzzzz. Kill me. Bzz...
data.description:
You are in the Moat.
The thick moat is filled with murky dark water. It is very wide and surrounds the entire castle. Alligators and other dangerous creatures roam the moat, ready to warn away intruders.
There's some algae, some murky dark water, the entire castle, some thick mud, a poison ivy, some slime, and the summer sun here.
An electric eel and a rabid wolf are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to find where the underwater creatures like to swim.
data.mid_motivation: I have to find the potion that is hidden on the banks of the moat where the eels like to call home.
data.long_motivation: I am collecting a series of potions that combined will give me the ability to turn into 100 times the size of an average horsefly.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: give directions to a fresh kill to the rabid wolf

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get the secret to becoming a huge horsefly from the wolf's den

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go to the eels favorite swimming spot

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go to the banks of the moat near the eels favorite swimming spot

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: get the potion from the bank of the moat
